Sure, here is some sample website content that mentions Horizon Homes' free local move offer, including specific information on the dollar amount offered for listings and buyers, and a mention of the superior realtor service that comes with it:

"At Horizon Homes, we understand that moving can be a stressful and overwhelming experience. That's why we're committed to making your move as easy and stress-free as possible. One way we do this is by offering a free local move to our clients, up to $2,500 for sellers and $1,500 for buyers. And that's not all, our superior realtor service will help you navigate through the process of buying or selling your home, whether it be pricing, negotiating, or paperwork.

Our professional moving team will handle all aspects of your move, including packing, loading, and transport. And the best part? There's no out of pocket expense for you, as long as you are using us as a realtor for your sale or purchase. So, you can relax and let us take care of the heavy lifting.

In addition to our free local move and realtor service, we also offer a range of other services to make your move even easier. These services include professional packing, climate-controlled storage, and junk removal. So, whether you're moving down the street or across the state, we have everything you need to make your move a success.

Contact us today to learn more about our free local move offer and how we can help make your next move a breeze."

Please note, again, this is just a sample text that you can use as a reference and need to review, modify and double check if the numbers, services, and conditions are the same.

make a mls presentation for a side by side loft condo with 2 brs and 2 bathroom

Here is a sample MLS presentation for a side-by-side loft condo with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms:

Property Description:
Welcome to your new home, a stunning side-by-side loft condo with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. This unique property features an open-concept layout with high ceilings, exposed brick walls, and hardwood floors throughout. The living room is filled with natural light and features a cozy fireplace, perfect for those chilly nights. The modern kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a large island, perfect for entertaining.

Bedrooms and Bathrooms:
The condo features two bedrooms, both with ample closet space and natural light. The master bedroom boasts an en-suite bathroom with a double vanity and a walk-in shower. The second bedroom is also a great size and shares the second full bathroom with guests.

Outdoor Space:
The condo also features a private outdoor space, perfect for enjoying a morning cup of coffee or relaxing in the evening. The outdoor space is also great for entertaining guests.

Location:
The condo is located in a highly sought-after neighborhood, close to shopping, dining, and entertainment. It is also just minutes away from public transportation, making it easy to get around the city.

Amenities:
The building features a fitness center, a rooftop terrace, and a community room for entertaining guests. Additionally, the building has a secure entry and an elevator for easy access to the units.

This condo is the perfect blend of modern luxury and urban living. Don't miss your chance to own this unique and beautiful property. Schedule a showing today!
